properties.name: bot.token
properties.description: The bot's token. This is used to authenticate with the Discord API

properties.name: bot.prefix
properties.description: This is what is used to prefix commands that the bot recognises

properties.name: bot.clientId
properties.description: This is used by Lavalink, and it is the ID of the bot

properties.name: lavalink.nodes
properties.description: Nodes are Lavalink servers that the bot can use to send audio from

properties.name: sentry.dsn
properties.description: The URL to POST Sentry requests to
